description: Souma`s adoptive older brother and legal guardian, as well as priest of the temple of the Solar and Lunar Priestesses. His duties are to care for and maintain the legacy of the Priestesses, as well as to prepare them for battle. Calm and collected, he is especially worried about Souma and what his Orochi blood will do to him; he also worries to an extent about Himeko and Chikane and what their duties will do to them. Even still, there are some indicators that imply he`s not telling everyone the full extent of what is going on.
name: Oogami Kazuki
